Class AppointmentsDatabaseAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.c195.AppointmentsDatabaseAccessor
  • public final class AppointmentsDatabaseAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Pulled out the Appointment Database functions to clean up DBAccessor
